mapper.sql: DISTINCT sis.id, sis.sign_uid as signUid, sis.last_sign_time as lastSignTime, sis.sign_day as signDay, sis.experience, u.id as "user.id", u.realname as "user.realname", u.username as "user.username", u.portrait as "user.portrait", u.email as "user.email", u.phone as "user.phone", u.vip_level as "user.vipLevel", u.auth as "user.auth", u.auth_info as "user.authInfo", u.status as "user.status"
mapper.select:
select
from sign_in_status sis LEFT JOIN sys_user u on sis.sign_uid=u.id ORDER BY lastSignTime,signDay desc
